welcomePage.title: Rational ClearCase SCM Adapter
welcomePage.intro: This page will help familiarize you with Rational ClearCase. To get started, read the sections below and click on the related links.
welcomePage.item: Use the Rational ClearCase integration to place your WebSphere Studio projects under ClearCase source control. For information about ClearCase procedures that apply to WebSphere Studio, see tasks.

Use the ClearCase menu options to share projects within both WebSphere Studio and ClearCase. For information about ClearCase menu options available with WebSphere Studio, see Rational ClearCase Menu Options.
Use the ClearCase preferences to customize your installation of ClearCase. For information about setting ClearCase preferences within WebSphere Studio, see Rational ClearCase Preferences.
